quotes.quote: Strive for that greatness of spirit that measures life not by its disappointments but by its possibilities.
The important thing is to strive towards a goal which is not immediately visible. That goal is not the concern of the mind, but of the spirit.
Strive to be first: first to nod, first to smile, first to compliment, and first to forgive.
In this life we get only those things for which we hunt, for which we strive, and for which we are willing to sacrifice.
Strive for perfection. Nobody's going to be perfect on this earth. But strive for perfection.
Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
We strive for error-free medicine in a world that is sometimes all too human.
Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
Don't waste your time striving for perfection; instead, strive for excellence - doing your best.
Strive with all your might to bring your interior activity into accord with God, and you will overcome exterior passions.
All men should strive to learn before they die, what they are running from, and to, and why.
Strive to be authentic, not perfect.
If you aim at nothing, you will hit it every time.
Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
Only the insecure strive for security.
To strive with difficulties, and to conquer them, is the highest human felicity.
In this world, one thing you should definitely strive for is originality. Just be who you are, and be your own person. That's what will make you stand out.
Strive to make something of yourself, then strive to make the most of yourself.
Striving for excellence motivates you; striving for perfection is demoralizing.
Vision without action is a daydream. Action without vision is a nightmare.
Don't worry when you are not recognized, but strive to be worthy of recognition.
Striving for success without hard work is like trying to harvest where you haven't planted.
The problem with striving for the best, is that there will be always better than the best.
Don't strive to be perfect. Strive for excellence.
Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
Strive to be authentic all the time. That's sort of my philosophy on life, which applies to acting.
The young do not know enough to be prudent, and therefore they attempt the impossible â€” and achieve it, generation after generation.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Excitement is the more practical synonym for happiness, and it is precisely what you should strive to chase. It is the cure-all.
A man should not strive to eliminate his complexes but to get into accord with them: they are legitimately what directs his conduct in the world.
